description: TypeScript toolkit for programmatic Keyboard Maestro automation with 30+ virtual actions, type safety, and ephemeral macro executio
rules: Always use createVirtual* functions instead of raw XML
Pass options as single object parameter with exact TypeScript property names
Use runVirtualMacro(actions, 'MacroName') to execute action arrays
Use KM_TOKENS for dynamic system information in macro text
Use get* query functions for immediate system information (getMousePosition, getFrontAppInfo, etc.)
Choose appropriate actions: createVirtualTypeKeystroke for typing, createVirtualMoveAndClick for clicking, createVirtualNotification for alerts
30+ virtual actions available covering UI, input, apps, variables, logic, control flow, clipboard, files, and media
